name: Viral Insurgent: REDUX
description:
FAM JAM 2 SUBMISSION!

Slide, wall run, and railgrind your way through the computer of Alex, an unknown entity holding information you seek to gain by infecting his machine. Everything is not so easy though, when you accidentally let in a much more powerful infection which attempts to flush you out.

  • Fast paced, oldschool movement and combat
  • Be a total badass with the return of the dual-wield shotguns from Viral Insurgent, now cooler!
  • Auto-aiming pistol for players who want to prioritize movement
  • Follow up on the almost nonexistent story of the original game
  • The more style you have, the more powerful you become
